subject: SUPREME COURT OF UNITED STATES
body:
SUPREME COURT OF UNITED STATES.
1600 Pennsylvania Avenue NW Washington DC 20500. USA.
From: John Glover Roberts Jr, 205 440 1352  
Chief Justice of The Supreme Court of The United States
Hello,Please can you respond urgent with your full address for us to give you the tracking number to enable you monitor the arrival of your atm package, and don't forget that your total amount of your fund which was on your atm package is $2.8 billion USD dollars,  
The ONLY charge you will EVER pay before your package leaves our office here is the $50.00 us dollars to obtain the approval order certificate (RAOC) with the Provision of Affidavit of Claim Certificate. YOU WILL NEVER pay a dime again as agreed and signed down here in Court that you will never pay any other money apart from the $50.00
Finally, you are advised now to buy a steam wallet card of $50 dollars or Razor Gold Gift card today and send it immediately once you receive this message so that within 5 working hours your package or consignment box or ATM CARD will get to your destination with your giving information. So I'm waiting to hear from you with the fee for us to proceed the delivery of your package peaceful,
Thanks and God bless.
Best Regards,
Yours Truly In Service,
Hon.Mr.John Glover Roberts Jr

subject: Re: SUPREME COURT OF UNITED STATES
body:
Hello Glover Roberts Jr,

Wow, this is such an unexpected surprise! I can't believe I have a billion USD dollars waiting for me. That's a lot of money! 

I'm curious though, how did this happen? How was my name chosen for this incredible opportunity? And what exactly is the approval order RAOC with the Provision of Affidavit of Claim?

Also, could you please explain more about the steam wallet card or Razor Gold Gift card? I'm not very familiar with these things.

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Janet
